name: laksham-assessment-portal
description: A modern assessment portal website for real-life on-job simulated question library - Built with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH="$PWD" && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
